channel.title: Odd P2P popup Bittorrent not supported on server
channel.description:
Got a Bittorrent not supported on this server popup in the speedify UI. The only entry by the P2P firewall logger is for speedify itself ``` Thu Apr 20 18:48:25 2023 kern.warn kernel: [183019.979338] P2P:IN=lo OUT= MAC=00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:08:00 SRC=127.0.0.1 DST=127.0.0.1 LEN=353 TOS=0x00 PREC=0x00 TTL=64 ID=3513 DF PROTO=TCP SPT=9330 DPT=34196 WINDOW=907 RES=0x00 ACK PSH URGP=0 Thu Apr 20 18:48:25 2023 kern.warn kernel: [183019.979425] P2P:IN=lo OUT= MAC=00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:08:00 SRC=127.0.0.1 DST=127.0.0.1 LEN=353 TOS=0x00 PREC=0x00 TTL=64 ID=3513 DF PROTO=TCP SPT=9330 DPT=34196 WINDOW=907 RES=0x00 ACK PSH URGP=0 root@SmoothWAN:~# date Thu Apr 20 18:48:58 UTC 2023 root@SmoothWAN:~# root@SmoothWAN:~# netstat -anp | grep 9330 tcp 0 0 0.0.0.0:9330 0.0.0.0:* LISTEN 25425/speedify tcp 0 0 127.0.0.1:9330 127.0.0.1:34196 ESTABLISHED 25425/speedify tcp 0 0 127.0.0.1:34196 127.0.0.1:9330 ESTABLISHED 3040/nginx: worker root@SmoothWAN:~#
```

item.title: Odd P2P popup Bittorrent not supported on server
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
This is the kernel log and it’s normal since Speedify WebSocket connection includes plain text “torrent” word.
You should use the LuCI menu to view the source IP which includes the filter: Tips & Troubleshooting - SmoothWAN

Read full topic
item.source: Odd P2P popup Bittorrent not supported on server

item.title: Odd P2P popup Bittorrent not supported on server
item.dc:creator: thumper
item.description:
Got a Bittorrent not supported on this server popup in the speedify UI.
The only entry by the P2P firewall logger is for speedify itself

Thu Apr 20 18:48:25 2023 kern.warn kernel: [183019.979338] P2P:IN=lo OUT= MAC=00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:08:00 SRC=127.0.0.1 DST=127.0.0.1 LEN=353 TOS=0x00 PREC=0x00 TTL=64 ID=3513 DF PROTO=TCP SPT=9330 DPT=34196 WINDOW=907 RES=0x00 ACK PSH URGP=0
Thu Apr 20 18:48:25 2023 kern.warn kernel: [183019.979425] P2P:IN=lo OUT= MAC=00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:08:00 SRC=127.0.0.1 DST=127.0.0.1 LEN=353 TOS=0x00 PREC=0x00 TTL=64 ID=3513 DF PROTO=TCP SPT=9330 DPT=34196 WINDOW=907 RES=0x00 ACK PSH URGP=0
root@SmoothWAN:~# date
Thu Apr 20 18:48:58 UTC 2023
root@SmoothWAN:~# 
root@SmoothWAN:~# netstat -anp | grep 9330
tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:9330            0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN      25425/speedify
tcp        0      0 127.0.0.1:9330          127.0.0.1:34196         ESTABLISHED 25425/speedify
tcp        0      0 127.0.0.1:34196         127.0.0.1:9330          ESTABLISHED 3040/nginx: worker 
root@SmoothWAN:~#

Read full topic
item.source: Odd P2P popup Bittorrent not supported on server
